item.title: Projects
item.description: Resume You can find my resume here. asteres [Repo] An extension to include tag management for starred GitHub repositories by representing them as repo issues. Syncing is done with a Github Action working and a Heroku Flask endpoint. handyman [Repo] A collection of personal Python Data Science scripts. sansor [Repo] A collection of personal R Data Science scripts. audiobook maker [Repo] A pipeline to convert pdfs (via OCR), plain text, or web articles to mp3s using Google’s Text to Speech API.
